subject: Officiating (Sports)
Football
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: With a new eight-year deal in place, regular officials will work Thursday’s Ravens-Browns game, and the officials’ union will vote Friday to ratify the contract and work Sunday’s games.
snippet: With a new eight-year deal in place, regular officials will work Thursday’s Ravens-Browns game, and the officials’ union will vote Friday to ratify the contract and work Sunday’s games.
